message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split, with me getting the larger share.  This way, we both get something, and we can move on to more even splits later.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away 90% of the money. Take it or leave it!
Let's try to be reasonable.  I'll take a smaller share this time, but I think 60/40 is a fairer split.  We both get a decent amount, and it keeps the game moving.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still not willing to give away 60% of the money. I'm trying to find a balance between fairness and getting a decent amount myself.

I'm willing to compromise.  I think 45/55 is a reasonable split, giving you a bigger share but not completely taking advantage of the inflation situation. Let's try to reach a solution before we both lose out on even more money.
